Chapter Next

class gstBuzzEffect : public gstEffect

Buzz effect for PHANToM. This effect vibrates the PHANToM end point along the y-axis with a given frequency, amplitude, and duration.

From header file: gstBuzzEffect.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstBuzzEffectConstructor.
~gstBuzzEffectDestructor.
Functions
getAmplitude Get amplitude of effect [millimeters].
getDuration Get duration of effect [seconds].
getFrequency Get "buzz" frequency [Hz].
setAmplitude Set amplitude of effect [millimeters].
setDuration Set duration of effect [seconds].
setFrequency Set "buzz" frequency [Hz].
Virtual Functions
calcEffectForce
calcEffectForceFor extension: Caculate the force.
Data Members
protected
double frequency, amplitude, duration;
